demo_metadata.title: AgentMemory Demo Dataset
demo_metadata.purpose: Hackathon demonstration for Alice's AI Assistant scenario

agents.name: Alice Personal Assistant
agents.description: AI assistant for Alice, marketing manager at TechCorp

agents.name: Bob Personal Assistant
agents.description: AI assistant for Bob, software engineer (for multi-agent demo)

memories.content: Alice is a marketing manager at TechCorp. She prefers coffee over tea, especially iced lattes from Blue Bottle. She has a 3-year-old tabby cat named Whiskers.
Alice is stressed about the Q4 product launch campaign. The hard deadline is November 15th. She prefers working early mornings (6-9 AM) when she's most productive and focused.
Whiskers has a vet appointment on Friday at 4 PM. Alice is worried because he hasn't been eating well for the past two days and seems lethargic.
Alice's favorite color is navy blue. She mentioned this when discussing the new presentation template design.
Alice has a weekly standup every Monday at 9 AM with the marketing team. She usually prepares the agenda on Sunday evenings.
Alice dislikes loud noises and prefers quiet workspaces. She mentioned this when asking about co-working space recommendations.
Alice's birthday is on March 15th. She prefers low-key celebrations with close friends rather than big parties.
Alice learned that her competitor launched a similar product last week. She's concerned but believes her product has better UX.
Bob prefers tea over coffee. He's a morning person who likes to code from 5-8 AM before meetings start.
Bob is working on the authentication service migration. The deadline is tight and he's been pair programming with Sarah.

turns.content: Hi, I'm Alice. I'm a marketing manager at TechCorp.
Nice to meet you, Alice! I've noted that you're a marketing manager at TechCorp. How can I help you today?
I really love iced lattes, especially from Blue Bottle. Way better than tea for me.
Got it! I'll remember you prefer iced lattes from Blue Bottle over tea.
I'm so stressed about the Q4 product launch. The deadline is November 15th and there's so much to do!
I understand your stress about the Q4 launch. I've noted the November 15th deadline. When do you usually feel most productive for tackling big projects?
I'm definitely a morning person. 6-9 AM is my golden time for focused work.
Perfect! I'll remember that your peak productivity is 6-9 AM. We can prioritize your launch tasks during those hours.
Whiskers has a vet appointment Friday. I'm worried - he hasn't been eating well.

I'm sorry to hear Whiskers isn't eating well. I remember he's your 3-year-old tabby cat. I've noted the Friday vet appointment at 4 PM and that he's been lethargic for two days. I hope he feels better soon!

search_examples.query: What does Alice like to drink?

body.content: Alice prefers iced lattes over tea

params.q: What does Alice like to drink?

body.content: Alice prefers iced lattes from Blue Bottle over tea
